text: 26.55: Lu 19.47 naŋga, 21.37Kandɨhɨrɨvɨ hañɨndaya Jisas krunzivi kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋ nɨmavami, Narɨ tuki kuta naŋga ahutɨmɨ mɨŋata yaŋ saŋga kurɨhahurɨha naŋga kipa naŋga mɨŋgaŋ mɨŋahandɨrɨm payɨmañandɨra. Yi imutamut Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨ hañɨndu upɨyɨ mɨnzɨta krunavundiŋ kuyu ŋgundin. Hara yaŋ kandɨtɨwɨmi haŋu mamɨŋahandandara.
